## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G05520](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G05520)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtCPA, CPA</u>
- **Gene Name:** capping protein A
- **Description:**   Subunits of heterodimeric actin filament capping protein Capz superfamily;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
